resources.string: Welcome to the world of Pokémon! Press the button below to begin your journey.
Two teams of three Pokémon are available to you. Click on the buttons below to see each Pokémon team in detail, and then choose one team.
An image of the enemy\'s current Pokémon, which typically shows an animal-like creature
An image of the player\'s current Pokémon, which typically shows an animal-like creature
An image of a Pokémon in the enemy\'s team, which typically shows a small animal-like creature
An image of a Pokémon in the player\'s team, which typically shows a small animal-like creature
